home.intro: I work on mobile application development with Flutter and Dart. During this time, I have completed and published various projects. I have gained experience in developing user-friendly, modern and performance-oriented applications.
home.subtitle: I'm Furkan Erdogan

about.title: About Me
about.content: During my university education, I actively participated in various projects. These experiences helped me understand the importance of teamwork, the impact of the work environment, and different working methodologies. In addition, as I became more proficient in using computers, I improved my skills in data collection, analysis, and algorithms. I am particularly interested in mobile programming. I work to develop modern, user-friendly mobile applications using Flutter. I also received sufficient training in English. I aim to improve myself day by day and advance in my career.

items.title: Flutter Portfolio
items.description: Furkan Erdogan Portfolio is a personal portfolio website. The user created this platform to showcase their projects and skills. Developed with Flutter, it offers a modern and performance-focused design.

items.title: Weather App Vol1
items.description: Weather Vol1 is a weather application that provides current weather information by detecting the user's location. It was developed with Flutter and uses Geolocator for location data. Weather data is fetched from the OpenWeatherMap API.

items.title: Weather App Vol2
items.description: Weather Vol2 is an improved version of the previous version. Geolocator and Geocoding packages have been integrated for better handling of location and address data. This Flutter-based application retrieves weather data via WeatherMap API and offers a more modern design.

items.title: AudioBooks App
items.description: AudioBook is an application where users can listen to books in audio format. The app features playback speed control and skip forward-backward functionality. The Audio Player plugin was used for audio playback operations in this Flutter-developed project.

items.title: Call Clink Button
items.description: Call Clink Button is a project developed for WordPress. It allows users to add multiple phone numbers. This project, primarily created using PHP and CSS, aims for a flexible structure and user-friendly design.

items.title: Library Automation
items.description: Library is a library application. Users can access book lists, search, and bookmark their favorite books. The application was developed with Flutter, using SQLite for database management.

items.title: The Pixel Game
items.description: The Pixel Game was developed as a fun pixel-based game. In this game, where players avoid obstacles to collect points, Unity and C# were used. It offers a simple but addictive gameplay.
